item.title: alpine-DNS-problem
item.description: Many softwares use alpine as their run-time base image. Recently I set up a docker registry with portus as its front. But I came up with a problem that, registry won’t post date: 2017-12-06 title: alpine-DNS-problem Firstly I thought it was a bug of docker resigtry, but as I’m digging into its code, I found that it’s actruely a bug of alpine linux. Alpine linux doesn’t have an /etc/nsswitch.conf config file.
